Plot: The first book of the Riverside Trilogy begins with Molly Woods who is a single mom raising her daughter after her fiance passes away. Studying to be a chef she begins interning at Chicago's 5 Star Riverside Restaurant where she meets witty and charming, Drake Stagliano. Molly hasn't allowed herself to fall for a man in 4 years so when she becomes smitten with her manager she's reluctant to fall for him. Finally giving into her desires, Molly is found torn as another man enters the picture. Who will stand by her when humiliation & crisis bring Molly to a panic attack in the realization that she's ready to move on from her late fiance... Fall in love, cry, and laugh as you embark on Molly's new journey! **Contains Mature Adult Content**
